title: About Elly
writer: Asghar Farhadi (screenplay), Azad Jafarian (story), Asghar Farhadi (story)
actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shahab Hosseini, Taraneh Alidoosti, Merila Zare'i
plot: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.
